view_forgot_password.title: Forgot password
view_forgot_password.success_hint: Password reset link was sent to {{email}}

view_reset_password.title: Reset password
view_reset_password.success_hint: Your password was resetted successfully. Now you can <Link>log in</Link>.

logout.title: Log out
logout.question: Are you sure you want to log out?

common_validation.email: This field must be a valid email
common_validation.contain_upper_case: This field must contain uppercase character
common_validation.contain_lower_case: This field must contain lowercase character
common_validation.only_latin: This field must contain only lating characters
common_validation.special_symbol: This field must contain special symbols
common_validation.min_length: This field must have at least {{minLength}} characters
